Class SearchTargetBlock

  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods that implements the search algorithm for finding the target block

        public void discoverBlock(double distance)

        yPrev - the y coordinate of the search path
        angleToPerf - the angle to be corrected

      • verifyDistance

        public boolean verifyDistance(double distance)
        This method verifies the distance detected by polling 5 data and calculate the average
        Parameters:
        distance -
        Returns:
        true if the distance detected is a valid detection
